casebody.data:
Kim MILLER
v.
DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 8, 2016

Thomas Gould Page, in support of the petition.

*387Scott R. Ouellette and Gail S. Shane, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 255, 145 A.3d 393 (2016), is denied.
